pizzas.title: Mario Special
pizzas.Description: An extra cheesy pizza on a thin and crispy base, loaded with olives and mushrooms.

pizzas.title: Luigi Special
pizzas.Description: Peppers and mushrooms on a Luigi-special garlic base, with bbq sauce instead of the usual tomato.

pizzas.title: Peach's Hawaiian
pizzas.Description: A fruity combination of pineapply, sweetorn and mushrooms on a light, thin base
